headline: BofA Securities Lifts AppLovin (APP) Target to $860 from $580, Keeps Buy
summary: AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) is one of the best stocks to buy according to Jim Simons’ Renaissance Technologies. On October 1, BofA Securities raised its price target for AppLovin Corporation (NASDAQ:APP) from $580 to $860. The firm maintained a “Buy” rating on the stock, which it said is supported by a detailed review of about 400 […]

headline: $200B Ad-Tech Giant Accused of Sneaky App Installs--Now the SEC Is Circling
summary: AppLovin's AI-fueled rise hits turbulence as forced-download allegations trigger scrutiny from regulators and short-sellers.

headline: Is RZLV's Brain Suite the Next Big Thing Shaking the Retail Space?
summary: Rezolve AI's Brain Suite powers more than 1.6B searches in 2025, backed by Microsoft and Google, redefining AI-driven retail commerce.

headline: Bristlemoon Global Fund Q3 2025 Report
summary: The Bristlemoon Global Fund returned 5.0 percent for the September 2025 quarter, with a 5.6 percent return for the month of September 2025, net of fees. Read more here.
